Overload.descr: Absolute Value
Returns on Windows -> "CMD" and on Linux -> "bash"
Pops up a message box containing the specified text, a Yes button, and a No Button
Binary to Hexadecimal
Sounds the speaker at frequency for duration
Bit by Bit AND

Character to Hexadecimal
Returns a string centered in length
Returns a string centered in length
Returns a copy of haystack in which newNeedle replaces occurrences of needle

KeyWord.name: CharIn
KeyWord.descr: Returns a string of up to length characters read from the character input stream name

KeyWord.name: CharOut
KeyWord.descr: Returns the count of characters remaining after attempting to write string to the character output stream name

KeyWord.name: Chars
KeyWord.descr: Returns the total number of characters remaining in the character input stream name

KeyWord.name: Condition
KeyWord.descr: Returns the condition information associated with the current trapped condition

KeyWord.name: Copies
KeyWord.descr: Returns n concatenated copies of string

KeyWord.name: CountStr
KeyWord.descr: Returns a count of the occurrences of needle in haystack that do not overlap

KeyWord.name: Date
KeyWord.descr: Returns, by default, the local date in the format: dd mon yyyy

Overload.descr: Returns string after deleting the substring that begins at the nth character and is of length characters
Returns string after deleting the substring that starts at the nth word and is of length whitespace-delimited words
Returns the current setting of NUMERIC DIGITS

KeyWord.name: Directory
KeyWord.descr: Returns the current directory, changing it to newdirectory if an argument is supplied and the named directory exists
